summary: Diff implements a new multi-page routed portal with Home/Product/Board/Connect/Legal pages, adds Messaging Terminal submission hooks, Founders’ Vault gating via Internet Identity + profile (name+email), a logout control, and Legal/IP + Safety Audit content. However, several blueprint requirements that demand exact English text/labels and certain gating/UX details are not evidenced (or appear to differ), and there are unrequested additions (notably a new backend file and footer attribution).

missing_requirements.requirement: Founders’ Vault includes a button labeled exactly “Access Secure Contact Details”, and when unauthenticated displays exactly: “Sign up to unlock the Tactic Transmit direct contact line.”
missing_requirements.reason: The FoundersVault component is truncated in the diff summary; the required exact CTA label and exact unauthenticated gating message are not visible in the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Show the full provided “Automated Network Access Email” subject + body text exactly, with a “Copy” action, and do not claim an email was actually sent.
missing_requirements.reason: The modal includes a custom subject/body that likely does not match the blueprint exactly, uses a “Copy Email” button label (not evidenced as exactly “Copy”), and includes wording that implies an email was received/sent (e.g., “You are receiving this email…”).

missing_requirements.requirement: Welcome Narrative section includes the exact quoted narrative sentence and credits Nandhukrishna Biju; Core Value grid labels and descriptions exactly as provided (High Fidelity / Zero Drift / Safety First).
missing_requirements.reason: The narrative sentence and the core value descriptions are present but cannot be confirmed to match the blueprint text exactly from the diff summary; the descriptions shown are short phrases that may differ from the required exact copy.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each of the four Product Deep-Dive component sections must include the exact technical description text provided in the blueprint (including special characters like Xtensa® and 1kΩ).
missing_requirements.reason: The page has four components and includes Xtensa® and 1kΩ, but the descriptions shown cannot be verified as the exact blueprint-provided text (they appear custom/extended).

missing_requirements.requirement: Board page uses the exact names, roles, and one-sentence descriptions provided in the blueprint.
missing_requirements.reason: Names match, but roles/descriptions shown cannot be verified as exactly matching the blueprint wording (e.g., role strings like “Lead Architect & Lead Code”).

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes an admin-only query to list submitted messages and prevents non-admin callers from reading the stored messages list.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend hook calls `getAllMessageTerminalEntries()`, but the backend implementation for listing entries and its admin-only authorization is not visible in the truncated `backend/main.mo` excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Header navigation includes links for Home, Product, Board, and Login/Connect.
missing_requirements.reason: Header contains Home/Product/Board/Connect, but there is no evidence of a distinct “Login/Connect” link/label in the header (only “Connect”).

hallucinated_features.description: Added separate backend module file `backend/migration.mo` containing state migration logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraint requires keeping all Motoko backend logic in the single actor file `backend/main.mo` (single-actor architecture). Adding this additional backend file appears to violate that constraint and was not requested as a feature.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes a “Built with … caffeine.ai” attribution block and outbound link.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the blueprint requirements and adds extra user-facing text/branding beyond the specified navigation intent.

hallucinated_features.description: Messaging Terminal success state says “We’ve received your message and will respond via email soon.”
hallucinated_features.reason: While responding via email is plausible operationally, the BuildRequest explicitly disallows external email delivery implementation and requires user-facing text to match the blueprint exactly where specified; this extra promise is not requested and could be misleading.
